hwNqa.name: hwNqa
hwNqa.contactinfo: R&D BeiJing, Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. Huawei Bld.,NO.3 Xinxi Rd., Shang-Di Information Industry Base, Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Zip:100085 Http://www.huawei.com E-mail:support@huawei.com
hwNqa.description: The private mib file includes the test information of the device. It is supplementary for rfc2925.txt.

hwNqaUdpEcho.name: hwNqaUdpEcho
hwNqaUdpEcho.description: Indicates that an implementation is using the UDP based echo server. Notes: The hwNqaCtlTargetPort and hwNqaCtlSourcePort need to be set, while in the pingUdpEcho Node, hwNqaCtlTargetPort must be set to the default value.

hwNqaTcpconnect.name: hwNqaTcpconnect
hwNqaTcpconnect.description: Indicates that an implementation is attempting to connect to a TCP port in order to calculate a round trip time. Notes: The hwNqaCtlTargetPort and hwNqaCtlSourcePort need to be set, while in the pingTcpConnectionAttempt Node, hwNqaCtlTargetPort must be set to the default value.

hwNqajitter.name: hwNqajitter
hwNqajitter.description: Indicates that an implementation is using udp for packet transfers. 'jitter' will cause the NQA(Network Quality Analysis) application to perform delay variance analysis.

hwNqaHttp.name: hwNqaHttp
hwNqaHttp.description: Indicates that an implementation is using udp for name resolution, tcp connect and tcp data transfer mechanisms for HTTP data download from a particular HTTP Server. It causes the NQA application to perform a download of the object specified in the URL.

hwNqadlsw.name: hwNqadlsw
hwNqadlsw.description: Indicates that an implementation is using tcp for sending keepalives. 'dlsw' will cause the NQA application to perform a keepalive operation to measure the response time of a DLSw peer.

hwNqadhcp.name: hwNqadhcp
hwNqadhcp.description: Indicates that an implementation is using udp for sending dhcp requests. 'dhcp' will cause the NQA application to perform an IP Address lease request/teardown operation.

hwNqaftp.name: hwNqaftp
hwNqaftp.description: Indicates that an implementation is using tcp packet for ftp connect and data transfer.

hwNqaMIBVersion.name: hwNqaMIBVersion
hwNqaMIBVersion.description: Version string of this MIB. The format will be: 'Version.Release.Patch: Description' An instance likes: '1.0.0: Initial NQA MIB'

hwNqaCtlTable.name: hwNqaCtlTable
hwNqaCtlTable.description: Defines the NQA Control Extend Table for providing, via SNMP, the capability of performing network analysis operations at a remote host.

hwNqaCtlEntry.name: hwNqaCtlEntry
hwNqaCtlEntry.description: Defines an entry in the hwNqaCtlTable. The operation of this table is same as that of pingResultsTable.

hwNqaCtlTargetPort.name: hwNqaCtlTargetPort
hwNqaCtlTargetPort.description: The destination port that may be used by udpEcho, tcpConnect and jitter probes.

hwNqaCtlSourcePort.name: hwNqaCtlSourcePort
hwNqaCtlSourcePort.description: The source port that may be used by all tests except for dns and dlsw. If no source port is specified, system will create a random port as source port.

hwNqaCtlTTL.name: hwNqaCtlTTL
hwNqaCtlTTL.description: Specifies the value to store in the TTL Field in the IP packet used to encapsulate the NQA probe.

hwNqaCtlJitterAdminInterval.name: hwNqaCtlJitterAdminInterval
hwNqaCtlJitterAdminInterval.description: Time value in milliseconds that is an interval between two continuous probes in jitter test. This object is only used by jitter test.

hwNqaCtlJitterAdminNumPackets.name: hwNqaCtlJitterAdminNumPackets
hwNqaCtlJitterAdminNumPackets.description: Packet number that specifys how many packets will be sent in one jitter test. This object is only used by jitter test.

hwNqaCtlHttpOperationType.name: hwNqaCtlHttpOperationType
hwNqaCtlHttpOperationType.description: Http operation type: get or post.

hwNqaCtlHttpOperationString.name: hwNqaCtlHttpOperationString
hwNqaCtlHttpOperationString.description: Http operation string. For example, if the http operation type is get, the string will be url, home page and http version.

hwNqaCtlFtpOperationString.name: hwNqaCtlFtpOperationString
hwNqaCtlFtpOperationString.description: Ftp operation string. If the ftp operation type is get, the string must be the file name which will be gotten from ftp server.

hwNqaCtlVPNInstance.name: hwNqaCtlVPNInstance
hwNqaCtlVPNInstance.description: VPN name by which system finds route in the specified VPN to send NQA probe packets.

hwNqaCtlHistoryKeptTime.name: hwNqaCtlHistoryKeptTime
hwNqaCtlHistoryKeptTime.description: To indicate how long the history records will be saved in the pingProbeHistoryTable table after the test stopped.

hwNqaCtlHistoryEnable.name: hwNqaCtlHistoryEnable
hwNqaCtlHistoryEnable.description: To indicate whether the history should be recorded in the PingProbeHistoryTable or not. enabled(1) --history will be recorded disabled(2) --history will not be recorded.

hwNqaCtlICPIFAdvFactor.name: hwNqaCtlICPIFAdvFactor
hwNqaCtlICPIFAdvFactor.description: The advantage factor depends on the type of access and how the service is to be used. This object will be used while calculating the ICPIF (Calculated Planning Impairment Factor) values. Suggestion values: |-----------------------------------|-------| | Service |factor | |-----------------------------------|-------| |conventional wire-line | 0 | |-----------------------------------|-------| |mobility within Building | 5 | |-----------------------------------|-------| |mobility within geographical area | 10 | |-----------------------------------|-------| |access to hard-to-reach location | 20 | |-----------------------------------|-------|

hwNqaCtlCodecType.name: hwNqaCtlCodecType
hwNqaCtlCodecType.description: To indicate the codec type to be used with jitter probe. This is applicable only for the jitter probe.

hwNqaResultsTable.name: hwNqaResultsTable
hwNqaResultsTable.description: Defines the NQA Results Extend Table for providing the capability of performing NQA operations at a remote host. The results of these operations are stored in the hwNqaResultsTable. The operation of this table is same as that of pingResultsTable.

hwNqaResultsEntry.name: hwNqaResultsEntry
hwNqaResultsEntry.description: The operation of this table is same as that of pingResultsTable.

hwNqaResultsRttNumDisconnects.name: hwNqaResultsRttNumDisconnects
hwNqaResultsRttNumDisconnects.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because the destination became disconnected. For connectionless protocol pingCtlTypes, this number should be zero.

hwNqaResultsRttTimeouts.name: hwNqaResultsRttTimeouts
hwNqaResultsRttTimeouts.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because the probe timed out.

hwNqaResultsRttBusies.name: hwNqaResultsRttBusies
hwNqaResultsRttBusies.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because all NQA tasks have been running. If a new probe fails to start, the value of this object is incremented. The next test will not start until the next Frequency.

hwNqaResultsRttNoConnections.name: hwNqaResultsRttNoConnections
hwNqaResultsRttNoConnections.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because the probe destination is unavailable. For connectionless protocol pingCtlTypes, this number should be zero.

hwNqaResultsRttDrops.name: hwNqaResultsRttDrops
hwNqaResultsRttDrops.description: The number of times that a NQA operation failed to initiated for unavailibility of necessary internal resources.

hwNqaResultsRttSequenceErrors.name: hwNqaResultsRttSequenceErrors
hwNqaResultsRttSequenceErrors.description: The number of packets arrived out of sequence.

hwNqaResultsRttStatsErrors.name: hwNqaResultsRttStatsErrors
hwNqaResultsRttStatsErrors.description: The number of some other errors.

hwNqaResultsMaxDelaySD.name: hwNqaResultsMaxDelaySD
hwNqaResultsMaxDelaySD.description: The maximal delay from source device to destination device. Currently this value is only used for jitter test, and this value must be 0 in other type test. In jitter test, if destination system time is not valid, the SD delay may be set 0.

hwNqaResultsMaxDelayDS.name: hwNqaResultsMaxDelayDS
hwNqaResultsMaxDelayDS.description: The maximal delay from destination device to source device. Currently this value is only used for jitter test, and this value is 0 in other type test. In jitter test, if destination system time is not valid, the DS delay may be set 0.

hwNqaResultsLostPacketRatio.name: hwNqaResultsLostPacketRatio
hwNqaResultsLostPacketRatio.description: The value of this object reflects the drop rate of NQA test. For example, this value is 30 that means source device only had received 70% packets of total sent packets.

hwNqaResultsPacketLateArrival.name: hwNqaResultsPacketLateArrival
hwNqaResultsPacketLateArrival.description: The value of this object indicates the number of the packets that arrived after the timeout.

hwNqaResultsRttSum.name: hwNqaResultsRttSum
hwNqaResultsRttSum.description: The sum of round trip time.

hwNqaResultsNumOfDelaySD.name: hwNqaResultsNumOfDelaySD
hwNqaResultsNumOfDelaySD.description: The number of delay from source to destination that are successfully measured.

hwNqaResultsMinDelaySD.name: hwNqaResultsMinDelaySD
hwNqaResultsMinDelaySD.description: The minimum of all one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaResultsSumDelaySD.name: hwNqaResultsSumDelaySD
hwNqaResultsSumDelaySD.description: The sum of one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaResultsSum2DelaySD.name: hwNqaResultsSum2DelaySD
hwNqaResultsSum2DelaySD.description: The sum of squares of one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaResultsNumOfDelayDS.name: hwNqaResultsNumOfDelayDS
hwNqaResultsNumOfDelayDS.description: The number of delay from destination to source that are successfully measured.

hwNqaResultsMinDelayDS.name: hwNqaResultsMinDelayDS
hwNqaResultsMinDelayDS.description: The minimum of all one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaResultsSumDelayDS.name: hwNqaResultsSumDelayDS
hwNqaResultsSumDelayDS.description: The sum of one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaResultsSum2DelayDS.name: hwNqaResultsSum2DelayDS
hwNqaResultsSum2DelayDS.description: The sum of squares of one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaJitterStatsTable.name: hwNqaJitterStatsTable
hwNqaJitterStatsTable.description: Statistics table for latest jitter activity.

hwNqaJitterStatsEntry.name: hwNqaJitterStatsEntry
hwNqaJitterStatsEntry.description: An entry contains the statistics for the latest jitter activity. This entry is created only if the pingCtlType is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfRTT.name: hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfRTT
hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfRTT.description: The number of received destination device responses with which jitter test can reach round-trip time.

hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesSD.description: The value of time that records the minimal positive jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesSD.description: The value of time that records the maximal positive jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesSD.description: The number that records positive jitter times from source to destination in the jitter test. The total number of the value of all positive jitters in packets sent from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of positive jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of positive jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesSD.description: The value of time that records the minimal absolute values of negative jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesSD.description: The value of time that records the maximal absolute values of negative jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesSD.description: The number that records negative jitter times from source to destination in the jitter test. The total number of all negative jitter values in packets sent from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of negative jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test. The total number of the value of all negative jitters in packets sent from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of negative jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfPositivesDS.description: The value of time that records the minimal positive jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfPositivesDS.description: The value of time that records the maximal positive jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfPositivesDS.description: The number that records positive jitter times from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfPositivesDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of positive jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsSum2PositivesDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of positive jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsMinOfNegativesDS.description: The value of time that records the minimal absolute values of negative jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsMaxOfNegativesDS.description: The value of time that records the maximal absolute values of negative jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsNumOfNegativesDS.description: The number that records negative jitter times from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsSumOfNegativesDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of negative jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsSum2NegativesDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of negative jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossSD
hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossSD.description: The lost packets number sent from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossDS
hwNqaJitterStatsPacketLossDS.description: The lost packets number sent from destination to source.

hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesSD.description: The value of time that records the average positive jitter value from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesSD.name: hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesSD
hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesSD.description: The value of time that records the average negative jitter value from source to destination.

hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsAvePositivesDS.description: The value of time that records the average positive jitter value from destination to source.

hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesDS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesDS
hwNqaJitterStatsAveNegativesDS.description: The value of time that records the average negative jitter value from destination to source.

hwNqaJitterStatsPktLossUnknown.name: hwNqaJitterStatsPktLossUnknown
hwNqaJitterStatsPktLossUnknown.description: The number of packets which is lost with unknown reason.

hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfICPIF.name: hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfICPIF
hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfICPIF.description: The ICPIF (Calculated Planning Impairment Factor) value for the latest jitter test.

hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfMOS.name: hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfMOS
hwNqaJitterStatsOperOfMOS.description: The MOS (Mean Opinion Score) value for the latest jitter test.

hwNqaTcpServerTable.name: hwNqaTcpServerTable
hwNqaTcpServerTable.description: A table which contains the status of NQA tcp server configuration information.

hwNqaTcpServerEntry.name: hwNqaTcpServerEntry
hwNqaTcpServerEntry.description: A table which contains the status of NQA tcp server configuration information. This entry includes not only the tcp server ip address but also the tcp server port.

hwNqaTcpServerRowStatus.name: hwNqaTcpServerRowStatus
hwNqaTcpServerRowStatus.description: hwNqaTcpServerIpAddress and hwNqaTcpServerPort must be set during a creation operation.

hwNqaUdpServerTable.name: hwNqaUdpServerTable
hwNqaUdpServerTable.description: Status of NQA udp server configuration information.

hwNqaUdpServerEntry.name: hwNqaUdpServerEntry
hwNqaUdpServerEntry.description: This entry includes not only the udp server ip address but also the udp server udp port.

hwNqaUdpServerRowStatus.name: hwNqaUdpServerRowStatus
hwNqaUdpServerRowStatus.description: hwNqaUdpServerIpAddress and hwNqaUdpServerPort must be set during a creation operation.

hwNqaStatsMaxGroupNumber.name: hwNqaStatsMaxGroupNumber
hwNqaStatsMaxGroupNumber.description: The maximum number saved per group. The maximum value of hwNqaCtlStatisticsGroupNumber can not exceed the value of this object.

hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable.name: hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable
hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable.description: Defines the NQA statistics control table for providing, via SNMP, the capability of performing NQA operations at a remote host. The results of these operations are stored in the hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable and the hwNqaGroupStatsJitterTable.

hwNqaStatisticsCtlEntry.name: hwNqaStatisticsCtlEntry
hwNqaStatisticsCtlEntry.description: Defines an entry in the hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable. The hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable has the same index as the pingCtlTable in order for a hwNqaStatisticsCtlTable to correspond to the pingCtlEntry.

hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval.name: hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval
hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval.description: Statistic information will be calculated after the time that is the value of hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval.

hwNqaCtlStatisticsGroupNumber.name: hwNqaCtlStatisticsGroupNumber
hwNqaCtlStatisticsGroupNumber.description: The value of this object indicates the number of group saved. The length of this object is from 1 to hwNqaStatsMaxGroupNumber.

hwNqaCtlStatisticsKeptTime.name: hwNqaCtlStatisticsKeptTime
hwNqaCtlStatisticsKeptTime.description: To indicate how long the statistic information will be saved after the test stops.

hwNqaCtlBeginTime.name: hwNqaCtlBeginTime
hwNqaCtlBeginTime.description: Time at which the type-specified test will start.

hwNqaCtlLifeTime.name: hwNqaCtlLifeTime
hwNqaCtlLifeTime.description: To indicate how long the type-specified test will last.

hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable.name: hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable
hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable.description: Defines the NQA statistics results table for providing the capability of performing NQA operations at a remote host. The statistics results of these operations in a statistic cycle are stored in the hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable. The statistic cycle is the value of hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval. The first two index identify the pingCtlEntry that the probe statistics result (HwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry) belongs to.

hwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry.name: hwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry
hwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry.description: Defines an entry in the hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable. The hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable has the same index as the pingCtlTable in order for a hwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry to correspond to the pingCtlEntry that caused it to be created.

hwNqaStatResIndex.name: hwNqaStatResIndex
hwNqaStatResIndex.description: An entry in this table is created when the statistics result of a NQA probe is determined. An implementation MUST start assigning hwNqaStatResIndex values at 1 and wrap after exceeding the maximum possible value as defined by the limit of this object ('ffffffff'h).

hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddressType.name: hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddressType
hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddressType.description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the corresponding hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddress object.

hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddress.name: hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddress
hwNqaStatResIpTargetAddress.description: This object represent the host address to be used at a remote host for performing a network analysis operation.

hwNqaStatResMinRtt.name: hwNqaStatResMinRtt
hwNqaStatResMinRtt.description: The minimum NQA probe round-trip-time (RTT) received. The value of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.

hwNqaStatResMaxRtt.name: hwNqaStatResMaxRtt
hwNqaStatResMaxRtt.description: The maximum NQA probe round-trip-time (RTT) received. The value of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.

hwNqaStatResProbeResponses.name: hwNqaStatResProbeResponses
hwNqaStatResProbeResponses.description: The number of responses received. The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no probe responses have been received.

hwNqaStatResSentProbes.name: hwNqaStatResSentProbes
hwNqaStatResSentProbes.description: The value of this object reflects the number of probes sent. The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no probes have been sent.

hwNqaStatResRttSumOfSquares.name: hwNqaStatResRttSumOfSquares
hwNqaStatResRttSumOfSquares.description: This object contains the sum of the squares for all NQA responses received. The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no NQA responses have been received.

hwNqaStatResStartTime.name: hwNqaStatResStartTime
hwNqaStatResStartTime.description: This object contains the start time of the statistic.

hwNqaStatResInterval.name: hwNqaStatResInterval
hwNqaStatResInterval.description: This object contains the interval between two times of statistic.

hwNqaStatResRttNumDisconnects.name: hwNqaStatResRttNumDisconnects
hwNqaStatResRttNumDisconnects.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because the destination became disconnected. For connectionless protocol pingCtlTypes, this number should be zero.

hwNqaStatResRttTimeouts.name: hwNqaStatResRttTimeouts
hwNqaStatResRttTimeouts.description: The number of times that a probe failed because the probe timed out.

hwNqaStatResRttBusies.name: hwNqaStatResRttBusies
hwNqaStatResRttBusies.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because errors related to sockets.

hwNqaStatResRttNoConnections.name: hwNqaStatResRttNoConnections
hwNqaStatResRttNoConnections.description: The number of times that a NQA probe failed because the probe destination is unavailable. For connectionless protocol pingCtlTypes, this number should be zero.

hwNqaStatResRttDrops.name: hwNqaStatResRttDrops
hwNqaStatResRttDrops.description: The number of times that a NQA operation failed to initiate for unavailibility of necessary internal resources.

hwNqaStatResRttSequenceErrors.name: hwNqaStatResRttSequenceErrors
hwNqaStatResRttSequenceErrors.description: The number of packets arrived out of sequence.

hwNqaStatResLostPacketRatio.name: hwNqaStatResLostPacketRatio
hwNqaStatResLostPacketRatio.description: The value of this object reflects the drop rate of NQA test packet. For example, if the value is 30, that means source device only had received 70 percent packets of total sent packets.

hwNqaStatResPacketLateArrival.name: hwNqaStatResPacketLateArrival
hwNqaStatResPacketLateArrival.description: The value of this object reflects the number of the packets that arrived after the timeout.

hwNqaStatResRttSum.name: hwNqaStatResRttSum
hwNqaStatResRttSum.description: This object contains the sum of the squares for all NQA responses received during the test lifetime. The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no NQA responses have been received.

hwNqaStatResNumOfDelaySD.name: hwNqaStatResNumOfDelaySD
hwNqaStatResNumOfDelaySD.description: The number of one way times from source to destination that are successfully measured.

hwNqaStatResMinDelaySD.name: hwNqaStatResMinDelaySD
hwNqaStatResMinDelaySD.description: The minimum one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaStatResMaxDelaySD.name: hwNqaStatResMaxDelaySD
hwNqaStatResMaxDelaySD.description: The maximum one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaStatResSumDelaySD.name: hwNqaStatResSumDelaySD
hwNqaStatResSumDelaySD.description: The sum of one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaStatResSum2DelaySD.name: hwNqaStatResSum2DelaySD
hwNqaStatResSum2DelaySD.description: The sum of squares of one way times from source to destination.

hwNqaStatResNumOfDelayDS.name: hwNqaStatResNumOfDelayDS
hwNqaStatResNumOfDelayDS.description: The number of one way times from destination to source that are successfully measured.

hwNqaStatResMinDelayDS.name: hwNqaStatResMinDelayDS
hwNqaStatResMinDelayDS.description: The minimum one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaStatResMaxDelayDS.name: hwNqaStatResMaxDelayDS
hwNqaStatResMaxDelayDS.description: The maximum one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaStatResSumDelayDS.name: hwNqaStatResSumDelayDS
hwNqaStatResSumDelayDS.description: The sum of one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaStatResSum2DelayDS.name: hwNqaStatResSum2DelayDS
hwNqaStatResSum2DelayDS.description: The sum of squares of one way times from destination to source.

hwNqaGroupStatsJitterTable.name: hwNqaGroupStatsJitterTable
hwNqaGroupStatsJitterTable.description: Test Group Statistic table for jitter activity in a statistic cycle. The statistic cycle is the value of hwNqaCtlStatisticsInterval. The first two index identify the pingCtlEntry that a probe statistics result (HwNqaStatisticsResultsEntry) belongs to.

hwNqaGroupStatsJitterEntry.name: hwNqaGroupStatsJitterEntry
hwNqaGroupStatsJitterEntry.description: An entry contains the group statistic information for jitter activity. This entry is created only if the pingCtlType is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaStatJitterIndex.name: hwNqaStatJitterIndex
hwNqaStatJitterIndex.description: An entry in this table is created when the statistic result of a NQA probe in a statistic cycle is determined. An implementation MUST start assigning hwNqaStatJitterIndex values at 1 and wrap after exceeding the maximum possible value as defined by the limit of this object ('ffffffff'h).

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosSD
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosSD.description: The value of time that records the minimal positive jitter value from source to destination in jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosSD
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosSD.description: The value of time that records the maximal positive jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosSD
hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosSD.description: The number that records positive jitter times from source to destination in the jitter test. The total number of all positive jitter values in packets sent from source to destination.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosSD
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of positive jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosSD
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of positive jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegSD.description: The value of time that records the minimal absolute values of negative jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegSD.description: The value of time that records the maximal absolute values of negative jitter value from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegSD.description: The number that records negative jitter times from source to destination in the jitter test. The total number of all negative jitter values sent from source to destination.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of negative jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegSD.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of negative jitter values from source to destination in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosDS
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfPosDS.description: The value of time that records the minimal positive jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosDS
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfPosDS.description: The value of time that records the maximal positive jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosDS
hwNqaStatJitterNumOfPosDS.description: The number that records positive jitter times from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosDS
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfPosDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of positive jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosDS
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquarePosDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of positive jitter values destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfNegDS.description: The value of time that records the minimal absolute values of negative jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfNegDS.description: The value of time that records the maximal absolute values of negative jitter value from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterNumOfNegDS.description: The number that records negative jitter times from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfNegDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of negative jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterSumOfSquareNegDS.description: The value of time that records the sum of square of negative jitter values from destination to source in the jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossSD
hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossSD.description: The lost packets number sent from source to destination.

hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossDS
hwNqaStatJitterPacketLossDS.description: The lost packets number sent from destination to source.

hwNqaStatJitterAvePosSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterAvePosSD
hwNqaStatJitterAvePosSD.description: The value of time that records the average positive jitter value from source to destination.

hwNqaStatJitterAveNegSD.name: hwNqaStatJitterAveNegSD
hwNqaStatJitterAveNegSD.description: The value of time that records the average negative jitter value from source to destination.

hwNqaStatJitterAvePosDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterAvePosDS
hwNqaStatJitterAvePosDS.description: The value of time that records the average positive jitter value from destination to source.

hwNqaStatJitterAveNegDS.name: hwNqaStatJitterAveNegDS
hwNqaStatJitterAveNegDS.description: The value of time that records the average negative jitter value from destination to source.

hwNqaStatJitterPktLossUnknown.name: hwNqaStatJitterPktLossUnknown
hwNqaStatJitterPktLossUnknown.description: The number of packets which is lost with unknown reason.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfICPIF.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfICPIF
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfICPIF.description: The maximum of all ICPIF values in a statistic cycle for jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfICPIF.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfICPIF
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfICPIF.description: The minimum of all ICPIF values in a statistic cycle for jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfMOS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfMOS
hwNqaStatJitterMaxOfMOS.description: The maximum of all MOS values in a statistic cycle for jitter test.

hwNqaStatJitterMinOfMOS.name: hwNqaStatJitterMinOfMOS
hwNqaStatJitterMinOfMOS.description: The minimum of all MOS values in a statistic cycle for jitter test.

hwNqaReactionTable.name: hwNqaReactionTable
hwNqaReactionTable.description: A table of NQA test monitoring notification and reaction configuration definitions. An entry is removed from this table when its corresponding pingCtlEntry is deleted.

hwNqaReactionEntry.name: hwNqaReactionEntry
hwNqaReactionEntry.description: Defines an entry in the hwNqaReactionTable.The first two index elements identify the pingCtlEntry that a hwNqaReactItemIndex belongs to. The third index element selects a single reaction.

hwNqaReactOwnerIndex.name: hwNqaReactOwnerIndex
hwNqaReactOwnerIndex.description: The first index of hwNqaReactionTable, it is the same as pingCtlOwnerIndex in pingCtlTable. hwNqaReactOwnerIndex and hwNqaReactTestName identify an existed test.

hwNqaReactTestName.name: hwNqaReactTestName
hwNqaReactTestName.description: The second index of hwNqaReactionTable, it is the same as pingCtlTestName in pingCtlTable. hwNqaReactOwnerIndex and hwNqaReactTestName identify an existed test.

hwNqaReactItemIndex.name: hwNqaReactItemIndex
hwNqaReactItemIndex.description: The third index of hwNqaReactionTable, it definitely identifies one of the reaction configurations for a test.

hwNqaReactCheckedElement.name: hwNqaReactCheckedElement
hwNqaReactCheckedElement.description: A list of reaction condition type. 'probetime' and 'probefailure' are valid when pingCtlType of the test is not hwNqajitter. 'jitterOwdSD': one way time from source to destination in jitter test. 'jitterOwdDS': one way time from destination to source in jitter test. 'jitterrtt', 'jitterpacketloss', 'jittersd', 'jitterds', 'jitterOwdSD' and 'jitterOwdDS' are valid when pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter. 'icpif' and 'mos' are valid when pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter and hwNqaCtlCodecType is 'g711Alaw' or 'g711Ulaw' or 'g729A'.

hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit.name: hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit
hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit.description: This object defines an administrative upper-threshold value for hwNqaReactCheckedElement. The value of this object is zero if hwNqaReactCheckedElement is specified as 'jitterpacketloss' and 'probefailure'.

hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit.name: hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit
hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit.description: This object defines an administrative lower-threshold value for hwNqaReactCheckedElement. The value of hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit should be equal or less than the value of hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit. The value of this object is zero if hwNqaReactCheckedElement is specified as 'jitterpacketloss' and 'probefailure'.

hwNqaReactThresholdType.name: hwNqaReactThresholdType
hwNqaReactThresholdType.description: This object defines the reaction threshold types. invalid(0): Invalid value. average(1): If reaction threshold type is average and the average value of watched operation exceeds threshold limit, an action specified in hwNqaReactActionType is generated when hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. consecutive(2): If reaction threshold type is consecutive and the times of watched operation consecutively exceeds the limit specified by hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum, an action specified in hwNqaReactActionType is generated when hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. accumulative(3): If reaction threshold type is accumulative and the times of watched operation accumulatively exceeds the limit specified by hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum, an action specified in hwNqaReactActionType is generated when hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. If reaction threshold type is not configured, the value of this object is 'invalid'.

hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum.name: hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum
hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum.description: This object defines a consecutive threshold limit. The value is zero when hwNqaReactThresholdType is not 'consecutive'.

hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum.name: hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum
hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum.description: This object defines an accumulative threshold limit. The value is zero when the hwNqaReactThresholdType is not 'accumulative'.

hwNqaReactActionType.name: hwNqaReactActionType
hwNqaReactActionType.description: Specifies the type of reaction to generate if the specified violation type occurs for the monitored element: none - No reaction is generated trapOnly - A trap is generated triggerOnly - All trigger actions defined for this entry are generated trapAndTrigger - Both a trap and all trigger actions are generated

hwNqaReactCurrentStatus.name: hwNqaReactCurrentStatus
hwNqaReactCurrentStatus.description: Specifies the current status of this reaction entry: invalid - Specifies the reaction entry status is uncertain. overThreshold - Specifies the reaction entry has met the hwNqaReactThresholdType and the threshold value. belowThreshold - Specifies the reaction entry has disobeyed the hwNqaReactThresholdType and the threshold value.

hwNqaReactRowStatus.name: hwNqaReactRowStatus
hwNqaReactRowStatus.reference: See definition of RowStatus in RFC 2579, 'Textual Conventions for SMIv2.'
hwNqaReactRowStatus.description: This object allows entries to be created and deleted in the hwNqaReactionTable. Creation of an entry in this table results in a new set of reaction configurations which take effect immediately. Deletion of an entry in this table results in corresponding reaction configurations are being deleted and stop taking effect.

hwNqaReactCheckedNum.name: hwNqaReactCheckedNum
hwNqaReactCheckedNum.description: The number of checked element samples that are monitored.

hwNqaReactThresholdNum.name: hwNqaReactThresholdNum
hwNqaReactThresholdNum.description: The number of checked element samples that are over threshold.

hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable.name: hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable
hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable.description: A table of NQA test monitoring notification and reaction configuration definitions. An entry is removed from this table when its corresponding pingCtlEntry is deleted.

hwNqaStatisticsReactionEntry.name: hwNqaStatisticsReactionEntry
hwNqaStatisticsReactionEntry.description: Defines an entry in the hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable. The first two index elements identify the pingCtlEntry that a hwNqaReactItemIndex belongs to. The third index element identifies an entry in the hwNqaStatisticsResultsTable. The forth index element selects a single reaction.

hwNqaStatReactOwnerIndex.name: hwNqaStatReactOwnerIndex
hwNqaStatReactOwnerIndex.description: The first index of hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable, it is the same as pingCtlOwnerIndex in pingCtlTable.

hwNqaStatReactTestName.name: hwNqaStatReactTestName
hwNqaStatReactTestName.description: The second index of hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable, it is the same as pingCtlTestName in pingCtlTable.

hwNqaStatReactIndex.name: hwNqaStatReactIndex
hwNqaStatReactIndex.description: The third index of hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable. An entry in this table is created when the statistics result of a NQA probe is determined. An implementation MUST start assigning hwNqaStatResIndex values at 1 and wrap after exceeding the maximum possible value as defined by the limit of this object ('ffffffff'h).

hwNqaStatReactItemIndex.name: hwNqaStatReactItemIndex
hwNqaStatReactItemIndex.description: The forth index of hwNqaStatisticsReactionTable, it definitely identifies one of the reaction configurations for a test

hwNqaStatReactCheckedNum.name: hwNqaStatReactCheckedNum
hwNqaStatReactCheckedNum.description: The number of checked element samples that are monitored.

hwNqaStatReactThresholdNum.name: hwNqaStatReactThresholdNum
hwNqaStatReactThresholdNum.description: The number of checked element samples that are over threshold.

hwNqaProbeTimeOverThreshold.name: hwNqaProbeTimeOverThreshold
hwNqaProbeTimeOverThreshold.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. Probe time(equals to RTT for some type of tests) is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit. 2. The probe time is accumulatively not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum. 3. The probe time is consecutively in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is not hwNqajitter.

hwNqaJitterRTTOverThreshold.name: hwNqaJitterRTTOverThreshold
hwNqaJitterRTTOverThreshold.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. The average NQA round-trip-time (RTT) of jitter packets is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit. 2. The RTT of jitter packets is accumulatively not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum in one test. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaProbeFailure.name: hwNqaProbeFailure
hwNqaProbeFailure.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. When the probe test accumulatively failed for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum in one test while the value of hwNqaReactThresholdType is 'accumulative'. 2. When the probe test consecutively failed for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdConsecNum in one test while the value of hwNqaReactThresholdType is 'consecutive'. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is not hwNqajitter.

hwNqaJitterPacketLoss.name: hwNqaJitterPacketLoss
hwNqaJitterPacketLoss.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. When the jitter packets accumulatively lost for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum in one test while the value of hwNqaReactThresholdType is 'accumulative'. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaJitterSDOverThreshold.name: hwNqaJitterSDOverThreshold
hwNqaJitterSDOverThreshold.description: The SD means the jitter values from source to destination. It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. The average of SD in one jitter test is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit and the hwNqaReactThresholdType is specified as 'average' type. 2. The average of SD in one jitter test is accumulatively not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum and the hwNqaReactThresholdType is specified as 'accumulative' type. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaJitterDSOverThreshold.name: hwNqaJitterDSOverThreshold
hwNqaJitterDSOverThreshold.description: The DS means the jitter values from destination to source. It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. The average of DS in one jitter test is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit and the hwNqaReactThresholdType is specified as 'average' type. 2. The average of DS in one jitter test is accumulatively not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit for a number of times specified in hwNqaReactThresholdAccumNum and the hwNqaReactThresholdType is specified as 'accumulative' type. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' and pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter.

hwNqaICPIFOverThreshold.name: hwNqaICPIFOverThreshold
hwNqaICPIFOverThreshold.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. When the ICPIF value in one jitter test is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger', pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter and hwNqaCtlCodecType is 'g711Alaw' or 'g711Ulaw' or 'g729A'.

hwNqaMOSOverThreshold.name: hwNqaMOSOverThreshold
hwNqaMOSOverThreshold.description: It is generated when the value of hwNqaReactCurrentStatus changes. The change may occur when the watched condition is over threshold or below threshold. The over threshold situations is specified as below. 1. When the MOS value in one jitter test is not in the range hwNqaReactThresholdLowerLimit through hwNqaReactThresholdUpperLimit. This notification is valid only when hwNqaReactActionType is 'trapOnly' or 'trapAndTrigger' , pingCtlType of the test is hwNqajitter and hwNqaCtlCodecType is 'g711Alaw' or 'g711Ulaw' or 'g729A'.
